title: His Forbidden Passion
description: Too hot to handle, too strong to deny? Dominic Montoya was darkly handsome and, oh, so dangerous to know. Cleo knew he was strictly off-limits. But she couldn?t turn her back on him altogether; he had information that could change her whole life? Cleo was torn as to which path she should choose, but reluctantly agreed to follow Dominic to his home on the sultry Caribbean island of San Clemente. Soon they were caught in the tangled web of their new family connections ? and their forbidden attraction was too hot to handle?but too strong to deny?
author: Anne Mather
